1439 Liberals boo as Trump swears in U.S. Military members at the Commanders game. Absolutely disgusting. Democrats have no respect for our brave troops who put their lives on the line to protect our country. Democrats hate America. posted 3 days ago by Mr_Rightside 124 comments award share report block Libs of TikTok @libsoftiktok • 3d JUST IN: Liberals boo as Trump swears in U.S. Military members at the Commanders game. Absolutely disgusting. Democrats have no respect for our brave troops who put their lives on the line to protect our country. Democrats hate America.

"Liberal" lets them off easy and makes them sound like simple democrats of the 60s.  Those people are gone - they are dead. Bolsheviks are marxists who have declared war on us and the White society that is our God-given birthright and was defended by our ancestors.  Dems are all-in for the illegal invasion and repubes are equally all-in for the H1B invasion.  Both are corrosive to our society and they know it. Worse, Trump also knows and we are seeing and feeling the results.  Younger people are completely giving up on the American Dream and there is nothing we can say or do to bring them back at this point.  Dystopian doesn't get close to covering it. Good people are giving up and it's hard to blame them. permalink award report block reply Awakened 4 points 3 days ago I wish this was the top comment. permalink parent award report block reply SicSemperTyrannis2 0 points 3 days ago This is why I call them demonrats. Those are historical terms that comes with a ton of context that is equal to their behavior. This is not the time or the place for such a ceremony. It's not what football is about or what it's for. It's not what the military is about or what it's for. Football is bread and circuses for low IQ people who are entertained by fat men pushing each other and tossing a ball around. I totally get the athletic component of it, but it's bread and circuses. Meanwhile, military service is about patriotism and young people committing to a life of discipline, honor, sacrifice, and service. That kind of commitment needs to be respected and not conflated with sportsballs. Liberals, however, wouldn't understand either of these nuances. They just don't care. Trump's there, so they pour out their hate like 3 year olds with no self-control. Pathetic behavior, and a total disgrace to both this country, and to the grown men they're paying to play a child's game for their entertainment.
